# EnumerableExtensions.EmptyIfNull&lt;T&gt; method

Returns an empty enumerable if *data* is null

```csharp
public static IEnumerable<T> EmptyIfNull<T>(this IEnumerable<T> data)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| T | Type of collection |
| data | The sequence. |

## Return Value

If data is null returns an empty IEnumerable&lt;T&gt;; Otherwise returns *data* value.
